00033 class KVILIB_API KviRegisteredChannel : public KviHeapObject
00034 {
00035         friend class KviRegisteredChannelDataBase;
00036 public:
00037         KviRegisteredChannel(const KviStr &name,const KviStr &netmask);
00038         ~KviRegisteredChannel();
00039 protected:
00040         KviStr               m_szName;
00041         KviStr               m_szNetMask;
00042         KviPointerHashTable<const char *,KviStr> * m_pPropertyDict;
00043 public:
00044         KviPointerHashTable<const char *,KviStr> * propertyDict(){ return m_pPropertyDict; };
00045         const KviStr & name(){ return m_szName; };
00046         const KviStr & netMask(){ return m_szNetMask; };
00047         KviStr * property(const char * name){ return m_pPropertyDict->find(name); };
00048         // val must be allocated with NEW!
00049         void setProperty(const char * name,KviStr * val){ m_pPropertyDict->replace(name,val); };
00050         void removeProperty(const char * name){ m_pPropertyDict->remove(name); };
00051 };
00052 
00053 typedef KVILIB_API_TYPEDEF KviPointerList<KviRegisteredChannel> KviRegisteredChannelList;
00054

00061         KviPointerHashTable<const char *,KviRegisteredChannelList> * m_pChannelDict;
00062 public:
00063         KviPointerHashTable<const char *,KviRegisteredChannelList> * channelDict(){ return m_pChannelDict; };
00064         KviRegisteredChannel * find(const char * name,const char * net);
00065         KviRegisteredChannel * findExact(const char * name,const char * netmask);
00066         void remove(KviRegisteredChannel * c);
00067         void add(KviRegisteredChannel * c);
00068         void load(const QString &filename);
00069         void save(const QString &filename);
